channel.title: Azure AI Foundry Model Updates
channel.description: Latest updates on Azure AI Foundry models sold directly by Azure

item.title: gpt-5.2-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model optimized for coding workflows, including Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension. It supports text and image processing and is available via both the Chat Completions and Responses APIs.

item.title: gpt-5.2
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model with large context support for advanced problem solving. It supports structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) input, and tool/function calling via Chat Completions and Responses APIs.

item.title: gpt-5.2-chat (Preview)
item.description: A GPT-5.2 chat-focused preview model for text and image input with text output. It supports structured outputs and tool/function calling via Chat Completions and Responses APIs, but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-5.1
item.description: A GPT-5.1-series reasoning model designed for advanced problem solving with very large context. It supports multimodal input, structured outputs, and tool/function calling via Chat Completions and Responses APIs.

item.title: gpt-5.1-chat (Preview)
item.description: A GPT-5.1 chat preview model with built-in reasoning behavior and large context. It supports structured outputs and tool/function calling, but does not support parameters like temperature typical of non-reasoning chat models.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model intended for coding scenarios and integrated tooling. It is available via the Responses API only and supports structured outputs plus tool/function calling with text and image processing.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model for coding workflows. It is Responses API only and supports structured outputs, multimodal processing, and tool/function calling.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-max
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model variant that adds support for setting reasoning_effort to xhigh. It is Responses API only and supports structured outputs, multimodal processing, and tool/function calling.

item.title: gpt-5
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model with very large context for complex tasks. It supports structured outputs, multimodal input, and tool/function calling via Chat Completions and Responses APIs.

item.title: gpt-5-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5 reasoning model intended to balance capability and cost while retaining large context. It supports structured outputs, multimodal input, and tool/function calling via Chat Completions and Responses APIs.

item.title: gpt-5-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-5 reasoning model designed for efficiency while still supporting large context. It supports structured outputs, multimodal input, and tool/function calling via Chat Completions and Responses APIs.

item.title: gpt-5-chat (Preview)
item.description: A GPT-5 chat preview model that accepts text and image input and returns text output. Preview version 2025-10-03 adds enhancements focused on emotional intelligence and mental health conversations.

item.title: gpt-5-codex
item.description: A GPT-5 Codex-optimized model for coding tasks and developer tooling integrations. It is available via the Responses API only and supports structured outputs, multimodal input, and parallel tool calling.

item.title: gpt-5-pro
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model offered via the Responses API with structured outputs and multimodal processing. It supports functions and tools and targets high-capability reasoning workloads.

item.title: gpt-oss-120b (Preview)
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model for text-in/text-out scenarios using the Chat Completions API. It supports streaming, function calling, and structured outputs, and requires a Foundry project to deploy.

item.title: gpt-oss-20b (Preview)
item.description: A smaller open-weight reasoning model for text-in/text-out scenarios using the Chat Completions API. It supports streaming, function calling, and structured outputs and is available via managed compute and Foundry Local.

item.title: gpt-4.1
item.description: A multimodal model that accepts text and images and outputs text, supporting both Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions).

item.title: gpt-4.1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-4.1-series multimodal model for text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions).

item.title: gpt-4.1-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-4.1-series multimodal model for text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions).

item.title: computer-use-preview
item.description: An experimental preview model trained for use with the Responses API computer use tool. It can control mouse/keyboard via third-party libraries and uses screenshots as image input for environment context.

item.title: codex-mini
item.description: An o-series coding model that is a fine-tuned version of o4-mini. It is available via the Responses API and supports structured outputs, multimodal processing, and tools/functions.

item.title: o3-pro
item.description: An o-series reasoning model focused on advanced problem solving with increased capability. It supports the Responses API with structured outputs, multimodal processing, and tools/functions.

item.title: o4-mini
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model offering enhanced reasoning abilities. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal processing, and tools/functions.

item.title: o3
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model designed for strong science, coding, and math performance. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal processing, and parallel tool calling.

item.title: o3-mini
item.description: A smaller o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities for text-only processing. It supports structured outputs and tools/functions.

item.title: o1
item.description: An o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and multimodal (text+image) processing. It supports structured outputs and tools/functions for advanced problem-solving tasks.

item.title: o1-preview
item.description: An older preview version in the o1 series. It remains available only to customers who were granted access as part of the original limited access release.

item.title: o1-mini
item.description: A faster and more cost-efficient o1-series option, ideal for coding tasks that require speed and lower resource consumption. Global Standard deployment is available by default, while standard (regional) deployments are limited to select customers from the o1-preview limited access release.

item.title: gpt-4o
item.description: A multimodal GPT-4o (Omni) model that integrates text and images in a single model for improved responsiveness and vision performance. It supports structured outputs, JSON mode, and parallel function calling, with multiple dated versions listed.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini
item.description: A fast, inexpensive multimodal model positioned as an ideal replacement for GPT-3.5 Turbo series models. It supports text and image processing, JSON mode, and parallel function calling.

item.title: gpt-4 (turbo-2024-04-09)
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with Vision is a generally available model and a replacement for earlier GPT-4 preview vision models. It can be used only with the Chat Completions API, and feature availability can vary by input method and deployment type.

item.title: text-embedding-3-large
item.description: The latest and most capable embeddings model for converting text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. Third-generation embeddings support a dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance control.

item.title: text-embedding-3-small
item.description: A third-generation embeddings model that improves multilingual retrieval performance compared to earlier embeddings. It supports adjustable embedding dimensions via a dimensions parameter in supported client versions.

item.title: text-embedding-ada-002
item.description: A legacy embeddings model for converting text into vectors for similarity search and retrieval. The documentation notes you cannot upgrade between embeddings models; migrating to text-embedding-3-large requires regenerating embeddings.

item.title: gpt-image-1
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model that creates images from text prompts and supports image generation/editing workflows. It is in limited access preview and requires registration for access.

item.title: gpt-image-1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-image-1 series image generation model for generating images from text prompts. It is in limited access preview and requires registration for access.

item.title: gpt-image-1.5
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model variant for creating images from text prompts. It is in limited access preview and requires registration for access.

item.title: dall-e-3
item.description: An image generation model that produces original images from natural language prompts. It is generally available for use with REST APIs, while some client SDK scenarios are in preview.

item.title: sora
item.description: An OpenAI video generation model that can create realistic and imaginative video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in East US 2 and Sweden Central (Global Standard).

item.title: sora-2
item.description: A newer Sora video generation model for creating video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in East US 2 and Sweden Central (Global Standard).

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token input and is intended for audio generation scenarios, with preview lifecycle cautions for production use.

item.title: gpt-4o-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token input and is intended for audio generation scenarios, with preview lifecycle cautions for production use.

item.title: gpt-4o-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o family preview model for real-time audio processing. It supports low-latency conversational interactions (speech in/speech out) and is available in multiple dated preview versions.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o mini family preview model for real-time audio processing. It targets low-latency audio interactions and follows preview lifecycle guidance (not recommended for production).

item.title: gpt-realtime (GA)
item.description: A generally available real-time audio model for low-latency audio processing. It is listed alongside related realtime and audio model variants for production use.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini
item.description: A smaller real-time audio model variant intended for real-time audio processing. Multiple dated versions are listed, indicating ongoing updates to the mini realtime offering.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15
item.description: A dated version of the gpt-realtime-mini model for real-time audio processing. It represents a specific release snapshot of the mini realtime model line.

item.title: gpt-audio
item.description: An audio model for real-time audio processing listed alongside the realtime model family. It supports audio workloads with specified token limits and is part of the Azure OpenAI audio model lineup.

item.title: gpt-audio-mini
item.description: A smaller audio model variant for real-time audio processing. Multiple dated versions are listed, indicating iterative updates to the mini audio offering.

item.title: whisper
item.description: A general-purpose speech recognition model used for speech-to-text and speech translation via the /audio API. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads per request.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o, available via the /audio API. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads per request for transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o mini, available via the /audio API. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads per request for transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
item.description: A speech-to-text model that includes diarization/automatic speech recognition features. It is available via the /audio API and supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads per request.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe-2025-12-15
item.description: A dated speech-to-text model variant with improved transcription accuracy and robustness. It is available via the /audio API and supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads per request.

item.title: tts (Preview)
item.description: A text-to-speech model optimized for speed, available as a preview model. It is used via the /audio API for generating speech from text.

item.title: tts-hd (Preview)
item.description: A text-to-speech model optimized for quality, available as a preview model. It is used via the /audio API for higher-fidelity speech generation from text.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts (Preview)
item.description: A GPT-4o mini powered text-to-speech model (preview) that supports guiding the voice to speak in a specific style or tone. It is used via the /audio API for text-to-speech generation.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts-2025-12-15 (Preview)
item.description: A dated preview version of the GPT-4o mini powered text-to-speech model. It supports style/tone guidance for voice output via the /audio API.

item.title: o3-deep-research
item.description: A specialized o-series model variant intended for deep research scenarios. It is currently only available with Foundry Agent Service, per the documentation note.

item.title: model-router
item.description: A Microsoft model that routes requests to underlying models based on the prompt, supporting text and image input with variable max output tokens. It offers a large context window and is available in Global Standard and Data Zone Standard in East US 2 and Sweden Central, with multiple versions listed.

item.title: MAI-DS-R1
item.description: A Microsoft reasoning chat-completion model that returns reasoning content and supports very large input/output token limits. It is available as Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: FLUX.2-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs image generation and editing model that supports both text and image prompts, including multi-reference inputs. Key features include support for up to 8 reference images via API, more grounded outputs, and enhanced flexibility and performance.

item.title: FLUX.1-Kontext-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs in-context image generation/editing model that supports character consistency and advanced editing. It can be used via Azure OpenAI image endpoints and a provider-specific BFL API with additional parameters such as seed and aspect ratio.

item.title: FLUX-1.1-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs text-to-image model emphasizing fast inference speed, strong prompt adherence, competitive pricing, and scalable generation. It is available via Azure OpenAI image generation endpoints and a provider-specific BFL API with extra parameters like width/height and seed.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-pro
item.description: A Cohere reranking/text-classification model for ordering documents by relevance. It returns JSON and supports multiple languages, and is available via Global Standard in all regions and via managed compute.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-fast
item.description: A faster Cohere reranking/text-classification model for relevance ordering. It returns JSON, supports multiple languages, and is available via Global Standard in all regions and via managed compute.

item.title: Cohere-command-a
item.description: A Cohere chat-completion model optimized for tasks like reasoning, summarization, and question answering. It supports tool calling and can return either text or JSON, with Global Standard availability in all regions.

item.title: embed-v-4-0
item.description: A Cohere embeddings model that can embed both text and images into vectors with selectable output dimensions. It supports multiple languages and is available via Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion reasoning model that returns reasoning content and supports large input/output limits. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and supports English and Chinese.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion reasoning model that returns reasoning content with large context support. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and supports English and Chinese.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.1
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion reasoning model that supports tool calling and returns reasoning content. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and supports English and Chinese.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1-0528
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with very large input/output token limits. It is available via both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed deployments in all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3-0324
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that supports tool calling and large context. It is available via both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed deployments in all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with very large input/output token limits and reasoning content. It is available via both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed deployments in all regions.

item.title: Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8
item.description: A Meta multimodal chat-completion model that accepts text and images with very large context limits. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and supports a broad set of languages.

item.title: Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct
item.description: A Meta chat-completion model for instruction-following with large input context and moderate output limits. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and supports multiple languages.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2512
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDFs (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text (optionally JSON/Markdown) and is available via Global Standard in all regions and Data Zone Standard in US/EU.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2505
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDFs (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text (optionally JSON/Markdown) and is available via Global Standard in all regions and Data Zone Standard in US/EU.

item.title: Mistral-Large-3
item.description: A Mistral multimodal chat-completion model that supports tool calling and can return text or JSON. It is available via Global Standard in West US 3.

item.title: Kimi-K2.5
item.description: A Moonshot AI multimodal reasoning model that accepts text and image input and returns reasoning content. It supports tool calling and is available via Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: Kimi-K2-Thinking
item.description: A Moonshot AI reasoning model described as the latest and most capable open-source thinking model in this lineup. It supports tool calling and is available via Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: grok-4
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model designed for enterprise use cases such as extraction, coding, summarization, and agentic applications. Registration is required for access, and it is available via Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: grok-4-fast-reasoning
item.description: A Grok model variant that supports text and image input with large output limits and tool calling. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and Data Zone Standard in the US.

item.title: grok-4-fast-non-reasoning
item.description: A Grok model variant for faster non-reasoning chat-completion that supports text and image input and tool calling. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and Data Zone Standard in the US.

item.title: grok-code-fast-1
item.description: A Grok model variant optimized for coding-oriented chat-completion with tool calling. Registration is required for access, and it is available via Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: grok-3
item.description: A Grok chat-completion model supporting very large input/output limits and tool calling. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and Data Zone Standard in the US.

item.title: grok-3-mini
item.description: A smaller Grok chat-completion model supporting very large input/output limits and tool calling. It is available via Global Standard in all regions and Data Zone Standard in the US.

item.title: Ministral-3B (preview) (2411)
item.description: A Mistral model listed for fine-tuning as a preview offering with unspecified output and training example context length details. It is marked as not supported for standard regions in the fine-tuning table, but available for global training.

item.title: Qwen-32B (preview)
item.description: A preview model listed for fine-tuning with an 8,000 token input limit and up to 32,000 output tokens. It is marked as not supported for standard regions in the fine-tuning table, but available for global training.

item.title: gpt-4
item.description: A GPT-4 model family referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments, with multiple versions including 0613 and preview variants. These models are used with the Chat Completions API and have region-dependent availability.

item.title: gpt-4-32k
item.description: A GPT-4 variant referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments with a larger context window than standard GPT-4. Availability varies by region and deployment type as shown in the Assistants/provisioned tables.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo family model referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments, with multiple versions (for example 1106 and 0125). Availability varies by region and deployment type in the Assistants/provisioned tables.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo-16k
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo variant with extended context referenced for Assistants availability. It appears in the Assistants table with region-dependent support.
